name: The New Yorker Miami Hotel
description: Located less than 6 miles of downtown Miami, this boutique hotel offers a daily continental breakfast. Free Wi-Fi is available. The colorful rooms of the The New Yorker Miami Hotel feature a flat-screen TV and vivid artwork. A work desk and seating area are included. Breakfast at the New Yorker is often held at the seating area by the pool. Items include bagels, fresh fruit and cereal. Guests are welcome to enjoy the garden or relax on the lounge chairs beside the pool. Laundry facilities, 24-hour desk service and security are also provided. Downtown Miami Beach is less than 8 miles from the The New Yorker Miami Hotel. Jungle Island is 13 minutes away.

name: Bikini Hostel, Cafe & Beer Garden
description: This South Beach hostel is centrally located 10 minutes’ walk from the beach and Lincoln Road District mall, restaurants, and bars. Features include Free Breakfast, Free Dinner and free WiFi. The 24-hour Bikini Hostel reception can arrange multilingual guided activities and entrance to night clubs for a fee. The Cafe and Beer Garden serves dinner. A shared kitchen is on site as well. The hostel is also 5 mi from Miami city center, Bayfront Park, and American Airlines Arena.

name: Hilton Aventura Miami
description: Our beautiful AAA 4-Diamond hotel is conveniently located across from Aventura Mall and a short drive away from Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood and Miami International Airports, Hard Rock Stadium, Gulfstream Park, Aventura Hospital, and Sunny Isles Beach. A complimentary shuttle is available within a five-mile radius. Indulge in culinary delights at Gala, offering South American-inspired cuisine, and enjoy specially crafted cocktails at MuseBar. We offer two amenity decks and poolside cabanas. Shuttle Service to Aventura Mall, Gulfstream Park, and Sunny Isles Beach is now available from 10:00 am - 6:30 pm daily. Hilton Aventura Miami is the ideal setting for work or play.Hilton

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Blanc Kara - Adults Only
description: Located in Miami Beach, Florida, this adult-only boutique hotel is just 3 minutes’ walk from the beach. A fully equipped kitchenette comes standard in each studio at Blanc Kara. A flat-screen TV, hairdryer and ironing facilities are also available in these soundproofed rooms. A 24-hour reception is offered for added guest convenience. All public and private spaces at Blanc Kara are nonsmoking. Free WiFi is available in every room. Valet parking is available at an extra cost. South Pointe Park is just 0.3 miles away. Guests will be 5.4 miles from the Port of Miami and 1.8 miles from Star Island.

name: Baymont by Wyndham Miami Doral
description: Enjoy the southern hospitality at this non smoking Baymont Inn and Suites Miami Doral, just of the Florida Turnpike, minutes from the Miami International Airport and convenient to golf, resorts, the Everglades, boating, beaches and the great dining, shopping and sights of downtown Miami. This hotel features complimentary wireless Internet access and complimentary continental breakfast. Splash in the outdoor pool, copy service, parking for trucks, buses and cars. Handicapped-accessible rooms are available and select suites are available with refrigerator and microwave, ideal for longer stays. There is no charge for kids through age 17 when staying with an adult.Wyndham

name: Posh South Beach
description: What better way to enjoy a stay in one of the trendiest cities on the planet and share it with like-minded travelers from around the globe? Posh South Beach Hostel offers affordable accommodations for international and out-of-state free-spirited travelers. Add in a rooftop pool, beautiful beach steps away, and a prime location on South Beachs famous Collins Avenue and youve got a trip of a lifetime. This fully renovated boutique loft at the epicenter of Miami Beachs shopping, attractions, and nightlife serves as a premier international hub, revolutionizing the concept of a hostel into luxurious 5-star accommodation.*Out of state and international guests are welcome. We cannot accommodate Florida Residents. If you are a Florida Resident, you will not be able to check-in.iHotelier/iStay

name: Blue House
address: 7533 Bounty Ave, North Bay Village, FL 33141
description: This property is a 20-minute walk from the beach. Blue House is located in Miami Beach, 3.7 miles from Holocaust Memorial, and has a garden, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 3.7 miles from Miami Beach Convention Center and 4 miles from Lincoln Road. The property is 5 miles from Art Deco Historic District and 5 miles from Ocean Drive. All rooms features air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature a garden view. At the guesthouse, rooms contain a seating area. A continental breakfast is served at the property. Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts is 3.9 miles from Blue House, while Versace Mansion is 5 miles from the property. Miami International Airport is 9 miles away. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip. This property is also rated for the best value in Miami Beach! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city. We speak your language! Your stay will include: Sun Deck TerraceExpedia
